DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFLY : INTERNATIONAL
DOC.TEXT: Mexican Industrial Output Rises : Production posted its largest monthly increase in more_than a year in April , the Mexican Finance Ministry said , growing 6.5 % compared to April , 1993.Construction led the way , rising 8.2 % for the period . Electricity came next , rising 7.7 % , then manufacturing at 6.7 % and mining at 1.6 % , the ministry said . For the first four months of 1994 , industrial production was up 1.7 % over the 1993 period .
